resources.string:
My Stories

Udacity

Capstone Project, Stage 2

Project Overview

Description

Tired to read news? Looking for inspired stories and things to laugh? Get in “My stories” application and your free time will change forever! Read interesting, funny stories every day and get inspired from famous quotes.

Intended User

The app is addressed to the average person who wants to read or see something funny and get undistressed from every day’s pressure.

Features

A user will be capable to read stories, view pictures and see video. The content will be updated every day from a Firebase database.

Worth the visit

  • You can get the source code of the application in GitHub.
  • Visit Udacity to find your suitable course. #NeverStopLearning #ThankYou
I am sending you this message through My Stories app and I want…
I could not communicate with Google Play! Check your internet connection.
